title: AI helps pave the way for self-driving cars
description: Even if Elon Musk's dream of robotaxis for everyone is a long way off, sleek electric cars powered by artificial intelligence packed the Consumer Electronics Show, promising to liberate people from the tedium of driving.

title: AI Revolution in Financial Markets: Technology Democratizes Analysis But May Amplify Volatility
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing financial markets by democratizing analytical capabilities previously exclusive to professional fund managers, enabling instant processing of complex market data that once required weeks of human analysis. This technological shift narrows the advantage gap between institutional investors and individual traders while introducing new volatility risks. As AI accelerates herd behavior formation and dissolution, markets may experience sharper and more frequent volatility swings, fundamentally changing how investment returns are generated in the modern financial landscape.
content: Artificial intelligence is reshaping financial markets in unprecedented ways, fundamentally altering how investment decisions are made and potentially increasing market volatility. The technology that creates realistic videos and generates human-like... [5163 chars]

title: Anthropic Is Raising $10 Billion At A $350 Billion Valuation
description: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup behind the chatbot Claude, is raising a new round of funding that would value the company at $350 billion before the new investment, according to people familiar with the matter. The AI developer is in talks to raise $10 billion in the round, said one of the people, who spoke on condition of anonymity to discuss private information. GIC, Singapore’s sovereign wealth fund, and Coatue Management plan to lead the new financing, the people said.
content:

title: Infosys Partners with Cognition in Strategic AI Collaboration for Global Enterprises
description: Infosys has entered into a strategic collaboration with Cognition to accelerate the AI value journey for global enterprises. The partnership aims to enhance artificial intelligence capabilities and deliver advanced AI-driven solutions to businesses worldwide, reflecting the growing importance of AI in enterprise digital transformation.

description: Some bankers in Asia are starting to worry about financing deals that would grant Chinese end-users remote access to advanced US chips amid the escalating battle between the world’s two superpowers for artificial intelligence dominance.

title: Tech firms must block unsolicited nude images under new UK rules

title: UK watchdog contacts Musk's X over abusive imagery, US state attorney expresses concern
description: WASHINGTON/LONDON, Jan 7 (Reuters) - Britain's data ‌regulator, the Information Commissioner's Office, said on Wednesday it had asked Elon ‌Musk's X to clarify how it was complying with data protection laws ‌following concerns that Grok, X's built-in artificial intelligence chatbot, was flooding the site with sexually abusive images of women.
